title: NIELIT Recruitment 2017 – 117 Sr & Jr Faculty Posts

organizations.name: polytechnic diploma in electronics/ electronics & electricals/ electronics & instrumentation
ministry of electronics and information technology
national institute of electronics and information technology

text: NIELIT Recruitment 2017 – 117 Sr & Jr Faculty Posts NIELIT Recruitment 2017 – 117 Sr & Jr Faculty Posts : Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology, Government of India, National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology (NIELIT), Chandigarh has published notification for the recruitment of 117 Senior Faculty & Junior Faculty vacancies on contract basis for CABA and DREAM Centers. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. NIELIT Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 117 Name of the Post: 1. Senior Faculty: 80 Posts 2. Junior Faculty: 31 Posts 3. Sr Faculty: 02 Posts 4. Jr Faculty: 04 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 19 – 48 years for Post No. 01 & 02 and 21 – 48 years for Post No. 03 & 04 as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess MCA/ B.Tech (CS/IT)/ M.Sc (CS/IT)/ NIELIT A Level/ PGDCA/ BCA with 02 Years Post Qualification experience for Post No. 01, NIELIT ‘O’ Level/ 12th pass with Diploma in CAM-DTP/ CABA-MDTP for Post No. 02, B.E/ B.Tech in Electronics/ Electronics & Electricals/ Electronics & Instrumentation for Post No. 03 & 03 year Polytechnic Diploma in Electronics/ Electronics & Electricals/ Electronics & Instrumentation or Diploma in Repair of Electronic Appliances and Maintenance for Post No. 04. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on Skype interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 350/- for Post No. 01 & 02 and Rs. 500/- for Post No. 03 & 04 through NEFT/ RTGS or Demand draft in favour of Director, NIELIT Chandigarh payable at Chandigarh/ Mohali (Punjab) (Bank Name – Punjab National Bank, Account No 78540059 19, IFSC Code – PUNB0785400). How to Apply : Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format with a recent colour passport size photograph should be affixed on the application along with the attested copies of their testimonials including post qualification and experience by post/ courier to the National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology (NIELIT), C-134, Industrial Area, Phase-8 (Sector 72), Mohali-160 071, Punjab. For more details like remuneration, experience, duration & other information click on the link given below…. NIELIT Recruitment 2017
